title: Zooey Deschanel cuddles up to Jonathan Scott in LA as the couple make things Instagram official
text:
They're taking their new relationship to the next level.

And Zooey Deschanel made things Instagram official with her new boyfriend Jonathan Scott on Sunday night.

The 39-year-old actress jumped into the arms of her reality star beau at Universal Studios' frightening Halloween Horror Nights in Los Angeles.

Love is in the air: Zooey Deschanel made things Instagram official with her new boyfriend Jonathan Scott on Sunday night

Zooey stayed warm while touring the terrifying lot wearing a blue jacket with white sleeves and dark denim slacks.

She looked comfortable in Jonathan's arms as he hoisted her up and away from the scary ghouls.

The new couple were joined by Jonathan's brother Drew and wife Linda Phan for the haunting adventure.

Sweethearts: The 39-year-old actress jumped into the arms of her reality star beau at Universal Studios' frightening Halloween Horror Nights in Los Angeles

Jokes! The brothers were quick to comment on Zooey's post and poked fun at each other

'Still processing how scared I was of these people dressed in spooky masks,' she shared to her Instagram followers.

'So much fun last night. That high pitched scream totally wasn’t me!' Jonathan joked to his fans.

The couple were spotted hand-in-hand earlier in September, just one week after Zooey ended things with husband Jacob Pechenik.

Over: Zooey split with husband Jacob Pechenik at the end of the summer after four years of marriage; seen in 2016

Sources told People magazine that the couple had been separated 'for several months' before announcing their split.

Jonathan rose to fame alongside his twin brother Drew as they co-hosted the popular Property Brothers home renovation show.

He was previously married to Kelsy Ully, but divorced nearly nine years ago.

Zooey and Jonathan started dating after meeting on the set of an episode of Carpool Karaoke in August.
description: The 39-year-old actress jumped into the arms of her reality star beau at Universal Studios' frightening Halloween Horror Nights in Los Angeles.
